mapper.html:
Hi {{1.Name}},
As you appraisal is approaching, please complete please complete the attached form before your appraisal appointment on: {{1.`Appraisal Date`}}
Please let me know if there are any concerns.
We look forward to meeting you. Smile Cliniq Manager
mapper.subject: Pre Appraisal Form
